column4: i am running an eeepc 900 with ubuntu, and i want to play some gmes in wine.. mainly GT3 and GTA VC .. i managed to install Vice City just fine. But the fps is to low. Wht i am thinking of is either set the detaillevel of the game somehow even lower than it ispossible in the GUI, or get some extra performnce out of the GMA950.
i have tried to tweak wine for optimal performance for loads of games.
the FPS just isn't up to scratch
even by going to the latest releases of wine.
ok then no wine  tuning.. wht about tuning the game, or tuning the videocard driver?
i had a GTS8800 640MB playing COD4, halflife 2 under wine 1.0
performance was pretty bad with fps around 20

i tryed to find some config file in the game.. no luck on that.. for the videocard i have no idea. the only thing that coes in mind i somehow disable features so that the game does not try touse them, like particles
turning all the effects down does improve it... but then the game looks shabby.
i had GTA_VC run finron a Geforce8400M :D
i dont care... :D i like the missions and the driving :D no need for bullet particles :D
haha yeh sure.. first person shooters.. I meant frames per sec.
i am the one whotweaked UT to thepoint where there where no textures at all :D
